page.content: {PLANNING, HOME OWNERSHIP, TYPES. { {PLANNING :}GLENROTHES HAS A REPUTATION FOR BEING A WELL-PLANNED TOWN(RECENTLY A GROUP OF SENIOR HOUSING OFFICIALS FROM ANKARA IN TURKEY CAME TO STUDY THE LAYOUT). ORIGINAL HOUSING STOCK(20 TO 30 YEARS OLD) IS BEING MODERNISED. {HOME OWNERSHIP :}RECENT GOVERNMENT POLICY ENCOURAGED HOME OWNERSHIP (ESPECIALLY FOR COUNCIL TENANTS) AND MORE PEOPLE THAN EVER BEFORE ARE BUYING THEIR HOUSE.CURRENTLY 36.4% OF THE HOUSING IS PRIVATELY OWNED, AND OF THIS 33% ARE FORMER COUNCIL HOUSES. {TYPES :}WE HAVE ONLY ONE MULTI-STOREY BLOCK, OTHER TYPES INCLUDING FLAT-ROOFED, TILED SLOPING ROOF, MAISONETTES, BUNGALOWS ALL OF THESE DETACHED, SEMI-DETACHED OR IN TERRACES.
